root.name: Elvira and the Party Monsters
root.description: OverviewElvira and the Party Monsters is a pinball machine developed and manufactured by Midway Games.DevelopmentDuring the development of Elvira and the Party Monsters, designer Dennis Nordman was involved in a motorcycle accident. While he was away, Mark Ritchie, Steve Ritchie, and Jim Patla helped finish up the tables design.
